    • seatsLeft

      public List<Float> seatsLeft(int Id)
      Specified by:
      seatsLeft in interface ConcertDao
      Parameters:
      Id -
      Returns:
      a list of floats that correspond to the number of seats left for a given concert for every seat type (float type was used in data storage since we were just dividing venue capacity with an integer, that could have resulted in a float) Used to calculate the number of seats left for a given concert for every seat type

    • validSeatNoCheck

      public boolean validSeatNoCheck(int Id)
      Parameters:
      Id -
      Returns:
      boolean Checks whether a concert has negative available seats after a placed order -> checks if order could be placed. Ended up not using it due to time limit.
